briefdescription.para: Default constructor with all inputs disabled.
Enable connection of acausal CADC debug line to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the synapse intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of causal CADC debug line to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the synapse intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of cadc_v_ramp_mux to pad.
Enable connection of capmem_i_out_mux to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the CapMem intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of CapMem intermediate mux to pad.

detaileddescription.para: The intermediate mux selects between different capmem-specific sources.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of capmem_v_out_mux to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the CapMem intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of capmem_v_ref_mux to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the CapMem intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of debug lines to pad.

detaileddescription.para: Enabling this connection on pad 0 connects the debug_plus line to that pad, enabling this connection on pad 1 connects the debug_minus line to that pad.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of neuron unbuffered membrane access neuron_i_stim_mux to pad.
Enable connection of synapse intermediate mux to pad.

detaileddescription.para: The intermediate mux selects between different sources in the synapse array, namely the debug lines at the synaptic input and the correlation readout.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of excitatory synaptic input debug line to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the synapse intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: Enable connection of inhibitory synaptic input debug line to intermediate mux.

detaileddescription.para: To reach the pad, the connection between the synapse intermediate mux and the pad has to be enabled as well.

briefdescription.para: A configuration container for the top-level readout mux, selecting the connections between an analog readout pad and different components on the chip.

detaileddescription.para: There are two equal instances of this mux on the chip, one for each of the two pads.
